description: Triangle T(n,m) = Nim-product of n and m, read by rows, 1<=n<=m.
comments: A051910 with the first column (the zeros) removed.
references: J. H. Conway, On Numbers and Games, Academic Press, p. 52.
links: R. J. Mathar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..3240
Index entries for sequences related to Nim-multiplication
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 20 1999
extensions: More terms (taken from the Conway reference) from _Joshua Zucker_, May 03 2006
